SELECT s.`id` FROM `subsidy` s WHERE s.`request_file_id` = #{requestFileId}

SELECT s.`id`, s.`status`, s.`request_file_id`,
TO_CYRILLIC(s.`FIO`) FIO_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`NP_NAME`) NP_NAME_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`CAT_V`) CAT_V_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`NAME_V`) NAME_V_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`BLD`) BLD_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`CORP`) CORP_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`FLAT`) FLAT_CYR,
s.`FIO`, s.`NP_NAME`, s.`CAT_V`, s.`NAME_V`, s.`BLD`, s.`CORP`, s.`FLAT`,
TO_CYRILLIC(s.`last_name`) last_name, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`first_name`) first_name, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`middle_name`) middle_name,
s.`VULCOD`, s.`DAT1`, s.`RASH`, f.`organization_id`, f.`user_organization_id`, f.`begin_date`, s.`internal_city_id`, s.`internal_street_id`, s.`internal_street_type_id`, s.`internal_building_id`, s.`outgoing_city`, s.`outgoing_district`, s.`outgoing_street`, s.`outgoing_street_type`, s.`outgoing_building_number`, s.`outgoing_building_corp`, s.`outgoing_apartment`, s.`account_number` FROM `subsidy` s JOIN `request_file` f ON s.`request_file_id` = f.`id` WHERE s.`request_file_id` = #{requestFileId} AND s.`id` IN
#{id}

SELECT s.*, f.`organization_id`, f.`user_organization_id`, f.`begin_date`,
TO_CYRILLIC(s.`FIO`) FIO_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`NP_NAME`) NP_NAME_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`CAT_V`) CAT_V_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`NAME_V`) NAME_V_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`BLD`) BLD_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`CORP`) CORP_CYR, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`FLAT`) FLAT_CYR,
TO_CYRILLIC(s.`last_name`) last_name, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`first_name`) first_name, TO_CYRILLIC(s.`middle_name`) middle_name,
w.`id` warning_id, w.`request_id` warning_reqiest_id, w.`request_file_type` warning_request_file_type, w.`status` warning_status, p.`request_warning_id` param_request_warning_id, p.`order` param_order, p.`type` param_type, p.`value` param_value FROM `subsidy` s left join `request_file` f ON s.`request_file_id` = f.`id` LEFT JOIN `request_warning` w ON (w.`request_id` = s.`id` AND w.`request_file_type` = 5) LEFT JOIN `request_warning_parameter` p ON w.`id` = p.`request_warning_id` WHERE s.`request_file_id` = #{id}
